title: A New Year
description: DEVIL WITH A RED DRESS ONThe New Year's Eve party was the last place John Brown wanted to be, and a woman was the last thing he was looking for. But his resolution not to have a good time was shaken by one very little red dress--and the maddening, impossible-to-figure-out young lady who filled it to absolute perfection.Margot Pulver had a New Year's resolution, too--to finally get herself noticed by a certain gentleman. And her scandalous new dress had had the desired effect. Trouble was, nothing could have prepared this inexperienced seductress for the breathtaking effect her intended victim was having on her ....
author: Lass Small
